page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: {FOOD, LEISURE, PETS. { {FOOD :}WE RARELY EAT A COOKED BREAKFAST. WE HAVE A LIGHT LUNCH AND HAVE OUR MAIN MEAL IN THE EARLY EVENING. WE BUY MANY KINDS OF FOOD, AND FOREIGN FOOD IS NOW POPULAR ESPECIALLY CHINESE, INDIAN AND ITALIAN. {LEISURE :}MOST LEISURE TIME IS SPENT WATCHING TV. MANY FAMILIES OWN A MICRO COMPUTER, OFTEN USED FOR GAMES BUT ALSO WITH PROGRAMMING IN MIND. READING IS STILL A POPULAR HOBBY AS ARE GARDENING AND MUSIC. {PETS :}MOST HOMES HAVE A PET, THE MOST COMMON BEING THE DOG. OTHER POPULAR PETS ARE CATS, RODENTS, FISH, RABBITS, BIRDS.
